en.answer:
Even if an effect such as Banisher of the Light's is applying, Crystal Beast Ruby Carbuncle can be placed in the Spell & Trap Zone when it is destroyed.

Furthermore, if you choose not to apply Crystal Beast Ruby Carbuncle's effect to place it there, Crystal Beast Ruby Carbuncle will be banished by the effect of Banisher of the Light etc.

~~~

This also applies to any of the following in place of Crystal Beast Ruby Carbuncle: Advanced Crystal Beast Ruby Carbuncle, Crystal Beast Sapphire Pegasus, Advanced Crystal Beast Sapphire Pegasus, Crystal Beast Cobalt Eagle, Advanced Crystal Beast Cobalt Eagle, Crystal Beast Amber Mammoth, Advanced Crystal Beast Amber Mammoth, Crystal Beast Emerald Tortoise, Advanced Crystal Beast Emerald Tortoise, Crystal Beast Topaz Tiger, Advanced Crystal Beast Topaz Tiger, Crystal Beast Amethyst Cat, Advanced Crystal Beast Amethyst Cat, Crystal Beast Rainbow Dragon, and Pumprincess the Princess of Ghosts.
en.question: The effect of Banisher of the Light, Macro Cosmos, Banisher of the Radiance, or Dimensional Fissure is applying. If a card such as Crystal Beast Ruby Carbuncle is now destroyed, can I place it in the Spell & Trap Zone as a Continuous Spell?
en.title: If Crystal Beast Ruby Carbuncle is destroyed while cards sent to the Graveyard would be banished instead, can I place Crystal Beast Ruby Carbuncle in the Spell & Trap Zone?

ja.question: 「<<7074>>」等が破壊された時に、「<<4914>>」や「<<6695>>」、「<<6682>>」、「<<6707>>」、「<<14740>>」の効果が適用されている場合、永続魔法カード扱いとして魔法＆罠ゾーンに置くことはできますか？
ja.title: 墓地へ送られるカードが除外される状況で破壊された「<<7074>>」を永続魔法カードとして魔法＆罠ゾーンに置く事ができますか？
